question: Looking at the bar chart, which statement best describes the pattern of rainfall over the past 14 days?

options.A: Rainfall reached its highest values in the middle of the period.
options.B: Rainfall remained mostly low (below ~45 mm) throughout the period.
options.C: Rainfall was generally higher during the first few recorded dates than in the middle periods.
options.D: Rainfall stayed roughly the same with little fluctuation across all dates.

explanation: The x-axis order has been manipulated to make it appear that the highest rainfall occurred from the start, when it actually peaked at the middle.
